workshoptitle: Running Tomcat & MySQL on Oracle A1

tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites for LiveLabs (Oracle-owned tenancies). The title of the lab and the Contents Menu title (the title above) match for Prerequisite lab. This lab is always first.

tutorials.title: Running Java Web Applications on Oracle Arm A1
tutorials.description: This workshop guides the user through building a nd deploying a Java web application running on Apache Tomcat 9.0 and MariaDB on OCI Arm A1 Compute platform.
